Label: WRtg
Description: Continuous power output capability of the inverter.

Label: ChaState
Description: Currently available energy as a percent of the capacity rating.

Label: State of Charge
Description: State of charge, expressed as a percentage.

Label: Total DC Current
Description: Total DC current flowing to/from the battery bank.

Label: Total Power
Description: Total power flowing to/from the battery bank.

Label: Cycle Count
Description: Number of cycles executed in the battery.

Label: Max Cell Voltage
Description: Maximum voltage for all cells in the bank.

Label: Min Cell Voltage
Description: Minimum voltage for all cells in the bank.

Label: Total Watt-hours Imported
Description: E8 - Energy from the Grid - Total

Label: Total Watt-hours Exported
Description: E3 - Energy to the Grid - Total

Label: E15 Energy Lifetime
Description: E15 - Inverter Backup Output Energy - runtime

Label: E1 Energy Lifetime
Description: E1 - Inverter Absorbed AC Energy - runtime

Label: E2 Energy Lifetime
Description: E2 - Inverter Apparent AC Energy - runtime

Description: E3 - Energy to the Grid - runtime

Label: E6 Energy Lifetime
Description: E6 - Consumed Energy from Inverter - runtime

Description: E8 - Energy from the Grid - runtime
